head.title: Rounding Up a Pair of Mules

hedline.hl1: Rounding Up a Pair of Mules

abstract.p: Letter by Angela Belt praises June 1 article on buying shoes on Internet

block.p: Loved the Online Shopper column, loved Michelle Slatalla's style, loved even the mere description of those Tommy Hilfiger mules enough to pony up the bucks and buy them online myself. Now I'll be able to replace my old Polo sneakers, the purchase of which required the reluctant assistance of two shoe salesclerks and an old boyfriend, as we checked box after box to find two size 8's with a plaid that matched across the tops. Thanks for bird-dogging another great pair of sneaks.
